name: ohm
description: an object-oriented language for parsing and pattern matching

scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
scripts.bootstrap: npm test --silent && npm run unsafe-bootstrap && (npm test --silent || (echo 'Bootstrap failed.'; mv -v dist/ohm-grammar.js.old dist/ohm-grammar.js))
scripts.unsafe-bootstrap: cp dist/ohm-grammar.js dist/ohm-grammar.js.old; node src/bootstrap.js src/ohm-grammar.ohm > dist/ohm-grammar.js.new && mv -f dist/ohm-grammar.js.new dist/ohm-grammar.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run bootstrap

author: Alex Warth <alexwarth@gmail.com> (http://tinlizzie.org/~awarth)
